entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:36 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023
